definition: to cry/to weep aloud/to crow/to hoot
to cry/to weep aloud/to crow/to hoot

sentences.english: If you fail , don't come snivelling.
sentences.chinese: 如果你失敗了，別哭哭啼啼來找我。

sentences.english: The bride does nothing but cry.
sentences.chinese: 那個新娘老師哭哭啼啼的。

sentences.english: It's not clear why people in Scotland would want to frighten a crying child.
sentences.chinese: 不清楚蘇格蘭人爲什麼要嚇唬哭哭啼啼的孩子們。

sentences.english: If you fail, don't come snivelling back to me.
sentences.chinese: 如果你失敗了，可不要哭哭啼啼地回來找我。

sentences.english: Her mother's word comforted the sobbing girl.
sentences.chinese: 她母親的話使這個哭哭啼啼的女孩得到慰藉。

sentences.english: Too grouchy, some of the girls would cry.
sentences.chinese: 脾氣太暴躁時，有些女生會哭哭啼啼。

sentences.english: A god of death, also will cry, pledge to outside the grave.
sentences.chinese: 死神當頭，也會哭哭啼啼，送到城外的墳墓。

sentences.english: Crying is the refuge of plain women, but the ruin of pretty one .
sentences.chinese: 哭哭啼啼是醜女的避難所，卻是糟蹋美人兒之地。

sentences.english: I don't live in an igloo or eat blubber or own a dogsled.
sentences.chinese: 我不生活在一個支柱或喫哭哭啼啼，或擁有狗爬犁。

sentences.english: What are you blubbering for, lass?
sentences.chinese: 姑娘，你哭哭啼啼是什麼緣故？

sentences.english: If you fail don't come snivelling back to me .
sentences.chinese: 如果你失敗了，別哭哭啼啼來找我。

sentences.english: And at last Joe, representing a whole tribe of weeping outlaws.
sentences.chinese: 最後喬扮演了一夥綠林好漢，哭哭啼啼。

definition: to make a lot of noise/to be disorderly
lit. like raindrops on a pear blossom (idiom)/fig. tear-stained face of a beauty
to wail at a funeral/formal wailing while offering sacrifice to the departed
to burst into tears/to sob loudly/to bawl
to bawl/to cry/to wail/to howl/also written 號哭|号哭[hao2 ku1]
to shout and scream (idiom); to kick up a fuss/to make a scene
